steps.title:
Convertigo No Code Studio
Demo
steps.intro: Learn how to create instantly No Code Apps

steps.title:
You can use one of our Single Sign On options here.
We also support SAMLv2 and LDAP for Enterprises
steps.intro: Please, select an authentication method to proceed to next step.

steps.title: Here is your dashboard. In here you will find all your apps you are building.
steps.intro:
Also you will see here the "Published App" and the "No Code Database" Tabs.
  • Click on "Published Apps" to see all the applications you published and those that are shared with you.
  • Click on "No Code Database" to list all thedata bases that have been created by you or shared with you.

steps.title: This is where you create a new empty Form or based on an existing template.
Let's add a new App!
steps.intro: Click the + icon to create a new App.

steps.title: Just name it Demo App
steps.intro:
Write "Demo App" in the 'Title' field.

Click the Save button to validate

steps.title: GDPR
steps.intro: We have here a GDPR notice a system administrator may have configured, just click ont it, once read.

steps.title: PALETTE
steps.intro: Here is the 'Palette' where all the components available for your App sit.

steps.title: FORM EDITOR
steps.intro: This is the main view of your APp where you add, modify and configure your components.

steps.title: PREVIEW
steps.intro: This button permits you to preview your App.

steps.title: PUBLISH
steps.intro:
Once your App is finished, click this button to publish it.

You can then share it with yours users to collect responses.

steps.title: COLLABORATORS
steps.intro:
Here, you will be able to add collaborators to your App.

Collaborators can edit your form and/or view Form's responses.

steps.title: Let's see in details some components of the Palette
SELECT
steps.intro:
This component is a control that provides a menu of options.

You can write your own options by hand or select data from the No Code Database.

steps.title: DATE
steps.intro: This component allows the user to pick a date.

steps.title: CAMERA
steps.intro: This component allows the user to take a picture

steps.title: DATA Grid
steps.intro: This component allows the user to represent data in a table. These data come from data sources.

steps.title: IMPORT FILE
steps.intro: This component allows the user to import files.

steps.title: SIGNATURE
steps.intro: This component allows the user to affix his signature.
